name: Hotel Dauro Granada

reviews.title: Perfect for Exploration
reviews.text: After an overnight flight from the US, we drove to Granada and were pleased to be able to find this hotel so easily. The freindly staff welcomed us, providing a comfortable room overlooking the busy street below but protected from the noise by thermopane windows while the valet parked our car in the garage below the building. This was expecially handy when one forgets something in the car.

reviews.title: Decent hotel for the price
reviews.text: The hotel is well located on a street filled with good places to eat and shop. The English speaking staff were most helpful in providing directions and making sure our stay was comfortable. I would recommend it highly.

description: Accommodation in Granada in great location in the heart of the city. The hotel has 36 rooms decorated with great attention to detail, and with superb, elegant, modern bathrooms. Among its many facilities, it offers free security boxes, press, minibar, canal +, radio-clock, private garage, WiFi, meeting rooms and conferences facilites, etc. Thanks to its location and proximity to the Granada Conference Centre, this accommodation in Granada is ideal for both holiday and business customers
